tooltip.lieutenant.fill: §7Fills area between selected points with block in off-hand. If there is none, the area is cleared.
tooltip.lieutenant.clone: §7Select an area to copy, then %s to paste the blocks.
tooltip.lieutenant.select: §7Use %s§7 to select two locations. %s§7 to select the targeted block, otherwise selects the block's side
tooltip.lieutenant.select_replace: §7Use %s§7 to select which block to replace, or air for all blocks.
